title: Che Chi Chi Chi Lyrics Majaa
stanzas:
Che chi chi chi chi
enna pazhakkam idhu
chinnpulla pola

pithu pudikkiradhe
thottuvittathaala
Che chi chi chi chi

oo vambu pannuva
nee vambu pannuva
adi eppavume ippadithaan
romba pannuva

kichu pannuva
kichu kichu pannuva
enna anga inga
thottu thottu
thappu pannuva

enna pannuva ippa
enna pannuva-unna
ennennavo pannaporen
enna pannuva
Che chi chi chi chi

ennudaya aasai
etti thoda thudikka
unnudaya aasa thatti
vida nenaikka
nammudaya aasa
vekkuthadi thavikka

ennudaya dhegam
othayila padukka
unnudaya dhegam
thondharavu kodukka
nammudaya dhegam
vetkathula vedikka

un kolusu mani pola
naan sinungi sinugiye
kedakka

en vayasu padhaneeru
nee kalandhu kalandhu
thaen kudikka

nee alli anaikka
naan killi kodukka
adi moththathula
thookkam kettu
kannu sevakka
Che chi chi chi chi

nalliravu neram
vennilava tholaikka
nandhavana poova
vandu vandhu tholaikka
vandhuvidu neeyum
ennuyirai tholaikka

nethimudi oram
nithiraya tholaikka
nenjukuli oram
mimmadhiya tholaikka
alli tharuvene
athnaiyum tholaikka

un elavam panju udambil
en ilamai muluvadhum
tholaikka

un salava senja sirippil
en sagala azhagayum
tholaikka

nee unna tholaikka
nana eenna tholaikka
methayila rendu perum
seththu polaikka

Che chi chi chi chi
enna pazhakkam idhu
chinnpulla pola

pithu pudikkiradhe
thottuvittathaala
Che chi chi chi chi

oo vambu pannuva
nee vambu pannuva
adi eppavume ippadithaan
romba pannuva

kichu pannuva
kichu kichu pannuva
enna anga inga
thottu thottu
thappu pannuva

enna pannuva ippa
enna pannuva-unna
ennennavo pannaporen
enna pannuva
Che chi chi chi chi
